attributes.action: Make speaking Doric mandatory in all Scottish Schools
attributes.background: Children in this day and age don’t know how to speak the Scottish language (Doric) fluent in Scotland but can learn German and French form a very young age. I believe that all children in Scotland should be able to Speak and Write the Scottish language. This is important to keep the language alive

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
